titles.title: To authorize a period in which otherwise eligible veterans with service-connected disabilities may apply for coverage under the Service Disabled Veterans Insurance Program.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Compensation, Pension and Insurance.

bill.summary: 8/6/1993--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to establish a period during which veterans who are otherwise eligible for coverage under the Service Disabled Veterans Insurance Program may apply for coverage under such program without regard to the one-year application period.
